summary: Investigation into compatibility issues with Ruby 3.2 and later versions. The issue was resolved as part of the SDK rewrite and is no longer applicable to the current version.
userImpact: Users running Ruby 3.2+ may have experienced compatibility issues with the SDK, but this is resolved in the rewritten version.
rootCause: Incompatibility between the previous SDK version and Ruby 3.2+
resolutionDetails: The SDK underwent a rewrite/refresh and this issue no longer applies to the current version
keyQuote: The SDK is undergoing a rewrite/refresh and this issue applied to a previous version and is no longer applicable
